name: Adil Mansuri
description: One of the leading modernist poets who broke many conventions. Wrote poetry in Urdu and Gujarati. He was also a famous calligrapher and playwright

name: Ahmad Faraz
description: Widely celebrated and sung Urdu poet. Rose to iconic stature through his seductively romantic and anti-establishment poetry

name: Ahmad Mushtaq
description: One of the leading and reputed Pakistani poets known for his neo-classical tone, equally well-known in India, lives in Houston USA.

name: Ahmad Nadeem Qasmi
description: Most outstanding Pakistani, Progressive poet. Also counted among leading fiction-writers. Edited an important literary magazine Funoon.

name: Akbar Allahabadi
description: The greatest Urdu poet of humour and satire who was a Sessions judge at  Allahabad.

name: Akhtarul Iman
description: One of the pillars of modern Urdu Nazms & Dialogue writer. Wrote dialogues for more than hundred films including "Waqt" & "Qanoon". (Jin ke ghar sheeshe ke hote hain wo doosron par pather nahin phenkte-One of his dialogues made famous by Rajkumar in Film Waqt).

name: Ali Sardar Jafri
description: One of the most celebrated progressive poets, literary critic, public intellectual and editor.Contemporary of Faiz Ahmad Faiz. Recipient of Gyanpeeth Award. Produced documentaries on Urdu poetry.

name: Allama Iqbal
description: One of the greatest Urdu Poets. National poet of Pakistan who penned 'Saare jahaan se achha hindostaan hamara' and 'Lab pe aati hai dua ban ke tamanna meri'

name: Ameer Minai
description: Eminent Urdu Poet and contemporary of Dagh Dehlvi. Famous for penning ghazal "Sarakti jaye hai rukh se naqaab aahista aahista".

name: Asrarul Haq Majaz
description: One of the most famous Progressive poets known for romantic & revolutionary poetry. He was maternal Uncle to film lyricist Jawed Akhtar.

name: Bahadur Shah Zafar
description: Last Mughal Emperor and contemporary of Ghalib and Zauq.

name: Bashar Nawaz
description: One of the prominent progressive poets, critic and lyricist Known for writing lyrics ‘karoge yaad to har baat yaad…’  for ‘Bazaar’.

name: Faiz Ahmad Faiz
description: One of the widely celebrated and popular Urdu poets. Equally sung in romance and rebel. Faced political repression against his revolutionary views

name: Firaq Gorakhpuri
description: One of the most influential Pre-modern poets who paved the way for the modern Urdu ghazal. Known for his perceptive critical comments. Recipient of Gyanpeeth award.

name: Gulzar
description: Celebrated poet, novelist, song and scriptwriter. Acclaimed for directing tele-serial on Mirza Ghalib. Recipient of Sahitya Academy and Dada Sahab Phalke awards

name: Hasrat Mohani
description: Freedom fighter, member of constituent assembly which drafted Indian Constitution. He gave the slogan "Inquilab Zindabad" during freedom movement. He was a devotee of Shri Krishna. He wrote the famous ghazal "chupke chupke raat din".

name: Jaun Eliya
description: One of the most prominent modern Urdu poets. Popular among masses for his unconventional ways

name: Jigar Moradabadi
description: One of the most prominent pre-modern poets who enjoyed stunning popularity and fan-following.

name: Kaifi Azmi
description: One of prominent progressive poets with popular appeal. Also film lyricist famous for his lyrics in films like Heer Ranjha, Kaghaz ke Phool etc.

name: Khumar Barabankavi
description: Popular poet who also penned film lyrics.

name: Majrooh Sultanpuri
description: One of the most lyrical of ghazal poets associated with progressive movement. Outstanding film lyricist. Recipient of Dada Sahab Phalke award.

name: Meer Taqi Meer
description: One of the greatest Urdu poets. Known as Khuda-e-Sukhan (God of Poetry)

name: Mirza Ghalib
description: Legendary Urdu poet occupying a place of pride in worldwide literature. One of the most quotable poets having couplets for almost all situations of life

name: Mohammad Rafi Sauda
description: One of the greatest 18th century poets. Contemporary of Mir Taqi Mir

name: Momin Khan Momin
description: Contemporary of Ghalib and Zauq. Also a physician, astrologer and chess player. Mirza Ghalib is said to have offered his complete Divan for his sher "Tum mere paas hote ho goya, Jab koi doosra nahin hota"

name: Munawwar Rana
description: Popular poet having dominating presence in mushairas.

name: Muneer Niyazi
description: One of the most outstanding modern poets who wrote both in Urdu and Punjabi. Also a film lyricist.

name: Nasir Kazmi
description: One of the founders of modern ghazal. Born at Ambala in India, he migrated to Pakistan and wrote extensively on the pain and sufferings of partition.

name: Nida Fazli
description: One of the most prominent modern poets with wide popular appeal. Well-known film lyricist, prose writer. Famous for his ghazal 'Kabhi kisi ko mukammal Jahan nahin milta…'.

name: Noon Meem Rashid
description: One of the founding-fathers of modern Urdu poetry.

name: Parveen Shakir
description: One of the most popular woman poets who gave expression to feelings and experiences specific to women.

name: Pirzada Qasim
description: Pakistani poet known for the ghazals laced with social and political satire

name: Qateel Shifai
description: One of the most popular poets ever and film lyricist. Famous for his ghazal 'Garmi-e-hasrat-e-nakaam se jal jate hain'.

name: Rahat Indori
description: Popular poet and film lyricist.

name: Sahir Ludhianvi
description: Leading progressive Indian poet and celebrated film-lyricist. Popular for his writings against social injustice and backwardness in society

name: Saleem Kausar
description: Well-known poet from Pakistan famous for his ghazal "main khayaal hoon kisi aur ka…"

name: Shad Azimabadi
description: One of the most prominent pre-modern poets.

name: Shahryar
description: One of the most prominent modern Urdu poets and lyricist. Wrote songs for the movie "Umrao Jaan". Recipient of the Bhartiya Gyan Peeth award.

name: Shakeel Badayuni
description: Famous poet and film lyricist

name: Tahzeeb Hafi
description: Immensely popular contemporary Pakistani poet.

name: Waseem Barelvi
description: Popular poet having vast mass following.

name: Zafar Iqbal
description: One of the most prominent and trend-setter poet of new Urdu ghazal having a vast following.
